subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Mikki Moore, a reserve forward for the Nets, may be the only N.B.A. player who can talk about snakes using the words “only” and “bite” in the same sentence.
snippet: Mikki Moore, a reserve forward for the Nets, may be the only N.B.A. player who can talk about snakes using the words “only” and “bite” in the same sentence.
